column1: The Pit Room////This bbq never disappoints!! The sliced beef offers this rustic/dry rub that accentuates the Smokey flavor. What I like the most
column2: is the minimal amount of Fat on the meat and you can pair it with sides or by itself and it will still taste amazing!! They also have a variety of bottled beverages and beers that are delicious and the drive thru it easy and quick
